import React, { useEffect }from 'react'; import './Slider.css'; import M from 'materialize-css'; import img1 from './utils/images/img1.jpg'; import img2 from './utils/images/img2.jpg'; import img3 from './utils/images/img3.jpg'; export function Slider(){ useEffect(()=>{ let slider = document.querySelector('.slider'); M.Slider.init(slider, { indicators: false, height: 500, transition: 100, interval: 6000 }); }) return ( <>

A graceful mid-century modern look that’s set in stone. Solid wood legs are topped off by an elegant marble slab for a clean, compact look that’s perfect for small spaces. It's a classic design that will transition through any style of seating. Mix and match with solid wood tables.

all_inclusive
